theorem P1_closure_iUnion_of_P1_closure
    {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {ι : Sort*} {S : ι → Set X}
    (hS : ∀ i, Topology.P1 (closure (S i : Set X))) :
    Topology.P1 (closure (⋃ i, S i : Set X)) := by
  -- `P1` holds for the union of the individual closures.
  have hUnion : Topology.P1 (⋃ i, closure (S i) : Set X) :=
    Topology.P1_iUnion_of_P1 (S := fun i ↦ closure (S i)) hS
  -- Taking the closure preserves `P1`.
  have hClosure :
      Topology.P1 (closure (⋃ i, closure (S i) : Set X)) :=
    Topology.P1_closure_of_P1 (A := ⋃ i, closure (S i)) hUnion
  -- Show that the two closures coincide.
  have hEq :
      closure (⋃ i, closure (S i) : Set X) =
        closure (⋃ i, S i : Set X) := by
    apply Set.Subset.antisymm
    · -- `⊆` direction
      have hSub :
          (⋃ i, closure (S i) : Set X) ⊆ closure (⋃ i, S i) := by
        intro x hx
        rcases Set.mem_iUnion.1 hx with ⟨i, hx_i⟩
        have hSub_i :
            closure (S i : Set X) ⊆ closure (⋃ i, S i) := by
          have hIncl : (S i : Set X) ⊆ ⋃ i, S i := by
            intro y hy
            exact Set.mem_iUnion.2 ⟨i, hy⟩
          exact closure_mono hIncl
        exact hSub_i hx_i
      exact closure_mono hSub
    · -- `⊇` direction
      have hSub :
          (⋃ i, S i : Set X) ⊆ ⋃ i, closure (S i) := by
        intro x hx
        rcases Set.mem_iUnion.1 hx with ⟨i, hx_i⟩
        exact Set.mem_iUnion.2 ⟨i, subset_closure hx_i⟩
      exact closure_mono hSub
  -- Reinterpret the goal using the equality of closures.
  simpa [hEq] using hClosure

theorem iUnion_closure_subset_closure_iUnion
    {X : Type*} [TopologicalSpace X] {ι : Sort*} (S : ι → Set X) :
    (⋃ i, closure (S i) : Set X) ⊆ closure (⋃ i, S i) := by
  intro x hx
  rcases Set.mem_iUnion.1 hx with ⟨i, hx_i⟩
  -- `S i` is included in the total union.
  have hSub : (S i : Set X) ⊆ ⋃ j, S j := by
    intro y hy
    exact Set.mem_iUnion.2 ⟨i, hy⟩
  -- Since `x ∈ closure (S i)` and `S i ⊆ ⋃ j, S j`,
  -- monotonicity of `closure` yields the desired membership.
  have : x ∈ closure (⋃ j, S j) :=
    (closure_mono hSub) hx_i
  exact this
